special_text:
If a creature entering causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.
[+1]: Target player draws two cards, then discards a card. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control.
[-3]: Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control.
[-8]: Return any number of target nonland permanents to their owner's hand.
